Description: For sale is a 1998 Gibson Custom Shop Les Paul Classic Plus in a beautiful Transparent Red with the original case. This guitar was made in the Gibson Custom Shop and has the logo on the back of the headstock. This guitar is in good condition and in perfect working order. There are some scratches, dings, and some wear on the back. Overall, I would give it a solid 7.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or issues. The neck is straight with no issues and plays great. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case has a broken combo latch but works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.67" 1st Fret: 0.76" 12th Fret: 0.88" Neck Type: Slim 60s Finger Board: Rosewood Pickups: 57 Classics Weight: 9lb 4oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart. I have provided tons of pictures. Please check them out. Utah residents please add 7.05% sales tax. Please call, text, or message me if you have any questions 18013179013. This item does ship worldwide. All items are shipped with full insurance and signature confirmation so there is no risk for you the buyer. I am very familiar with shipping internationally. This item will be packed very safe and secure. International buyers are responsible for any import duties. International purchases will ship UPS.
